Texts.Chs: ^green;生物化学^white; - 生化实验台是一体化的化学实验专用设备，任何与化学公式相关的都是在这里进行的。同时你也可以在这里生产一些更加有趣的东西，例如能量武器中使用的不稳定粒子，没有生化实验室你将无法生存。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Bio-Chemistry^white; - The BioChem Lab is your all-in-one chemistry station. Any sort of tinkering involving formulas is done here. Likewise, you can produce some more...interesting things. Such as unstable particles for use in energy weapons. The BioChem lab is absolutely essential to your continued success and survival.

Texts.Chs: ^green;钙石^white; - 钙石是非常有用的，产生硝和碘。如果你不知道在哪里寻找钙石，我建议去沙漠寻找，你或许可以在那里找到。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Caliche^white; - Caliche stone is extremely useful, producing both saltpeter and iodine. You'll need both. Finding Caliche can be tricky if you don't know where to look. Check deserts, they typically have a lot.

Texts.Chs: ^green;合成基因^white; - 那么接下来介绍一下基因合成器。它可以创造出你在所有星球上都无法找到的全新的未知植物！这一切的未知将由你来探索，新植物进化的篇章将由你来谱写。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Designing Genes^white; - The Gene Design Lab is your best friend. Here, you combine all the things you've made in previously built stations in order to create new seeds! Hundreds of plant types await.

Texts.Chs: ^green;物质萃取 II^white; - 通常，你在萃取工作时会得到一些物品。像是营养糊，组织培养物，矿物原料，遗传物质或其他任何东西。它们都有各自的用处，你在其他领域肯定会需要它们。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Extraction^white; - You'll typically get one of a few things when extracting. Nutrient Paste, Tissue Cultures, Raw Minerals, or Genetic Material. All have their uses, and you will definitely need many of each. Material outputs vary greatly, however, and you may find yourself with exceptionally more valuable resources.

Texts.Chs: ^green;化肥^white; - 大部分用于研究植物种子的配方都会需要到化肥。化肥有很多种，某些植物将会需要更高级的化肥。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Fertilizer^white; - A large portion of recipes for research or plant seeds will require Fertilizer in order to be created. That means you'll need a myriad of materials. There are varying strengths of fertilizer, and some plants will require the more advanced forms.

Texts.Chs: ^green;寻找资源^white; -,遗传物质一般能在肉类，某些植物和其他类似的东西上找到。你会在石头，矿石和富含矿物质的其他东西中找到矿物原料。组织培养物在植物和种子中最容易发现。而营养糊则存在于大多数的土壤中。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Finding Resources^white; - Genetic Material is most commonly found in meats, certain plants and similar stuff. You'll find Raw Minerals in stone, ore and other things rich in mineral content. Tissue Culture is most common from plants, seeds and produce. Nutrient Paste is common in most soils.

Texts.Chs: ^green;氢^white; - 氢是一种常见的且易获取的气体。只要把一些水放入萃取实验室即可获得大量的氢。以后你也可以建造一台空气冷凝器，它可以更快地获取氢气。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Hydrogen^white; - Hydrogen is common and relatively easy to obtain. Toss some water in your extractor and you're good to go. Later on you'll be able to create an Atmosphere Condenser and suck it right out of the air around you!

Texts.Chs: ^green;说明^white; - 那么，你是否幻想过你是一个植物学家，科学家还是化学家？不管怎样，对于科学而言，你需要走的路极其漫长，本指南将简单的为你介绍一些该如何在 Frackin'Universe 里游玩。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Introduction^white; - So, you fancy yourself a botanist? A scientist? Chemist? Whatever the case, you've a long road ahead of you. This guide will brief you on what you need to know to play with Frackin' Universe effectively.

Texts.Chs: ^green;实验空间^white; - 把你的物质汇编机放好后，你可能开始觉得这些机器需要大量的空间来放置。当然，任何一个有自尊心的科学家都会为这些神圣的实验机器腾出空间，谁不想要一间实验室呢？！所以你应该建造一个存放设备的建筑物，因为以后将会有越来越多的设备需要摆放！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Lab Space^white; - With your Matter Assembler placed, you are probably starting to realize that you will need a substantial amount of space for your lab. Any self-respecting scientist would make room for such a glorious thing! Who DOESN'T want a lab?!?! But I get ahead of myself here...You'll be able to create several more stations now.

Texts.Chs: ^green;甲醇^white; - 甲醇是较为重要的资源。当然它也很容易发现。 砍一些树，把甲醇从木材中提取出来，就是这么简单！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Methanol^white; - Methanol is an important resource for several goods. Where it's found is pretty straightforward. Cut down some trees. Extract from the wood in your extractor. Simple as that!

Texts.Chs: ^green;采矿^white; - 你可能并不想去做太多的体力活。因为你是一名科学家，对吧？千万不要这么想，所以快拿起你的物质枪，然后开始挖掘吧！(或者在物质汇编机里制作一把适用于采集矿物的武器)如果你不这样做，你永远不会找到你需要的矿物。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Mining^white; - You probably don't want to do much hard work. You're a science guy, after all right? Tough cookies. Get your matter manipulator and start digging (or build a Basic Miner in the Matter Assembler). Otherwise you'll never find what you need.

Texts.Chs: ^green;其他实验设备^white; - 如果你只制作了最基础的设备，那么还有十几种设备等着你呢，它们有的可以提高生产力，有的可以产出各类资源。我建议你逐步地尝试制作出来。不过，我觉得你肯定会需要一个军械库，装备合成器和纳米加工器。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Other Labs^white; - You've only just scratched the surface, and there are over a dozen additional labs that can increase productivity, output and so very much more. I recommend trying everything, but you'll definitely want an Armory, Clothing Fabricator and Nanofabricator.

Texts.Chs: ^green;高级塑料和硅 I^white; - 某些产物你会需要到高级塑料。要想得到高级塑料，你首先需要得到一些真丝纤维。^orange;蕨树^white;也可以生产出真丝纤维，另外还可以制作蚕房，它也会产出真丝纤维。最后如果你在旅行中发现蜘蛛丝，请收集好，它也可以提取出丝。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Plastic and Silicon pt 1^white; - To make some products, you'll need Plastic. In order to make Plastic, you first need to get some silk. ^orange;Bracken Trees^white; shed silk, as do moths. Alternatively, Spider Silk extracts quite well into silk should you find any in your travels.

Texts.Chs: ^green;高级塑料和硅 II^white; -  而硅获得的途径则更简单，你只需要把沙子进行萃取就可以获得硅。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Plastic and Silicon pt 2^white; - Silicon is easier to come by, since for the most part you need only extract sand for it. Some sands produce a a bit more and as such you'll want to experiment.

Texts.Chs: ^green;储存物品^white; - 你需要一个安全有效的设备来存储你背包里成吨的物资？其实，解决方案很简单：基因储存箱。快去制作吧！有了它们，你完全不用担心存放问题。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Storing Your Goods^white; - Need somewhere to store the dozens of resources you're inevitably going to create through your research? Well, the solution is simple enough: Gene Cabinets. Build a couple of these and you will be good to go. They're cheap and easy to make!

Texts.Chs: ^green;物质萃取 I^white; - 接下来，你需要一个物质萃取器。这台机器对于新手来说是十分重要的。你只需要把你想要萃取的材料放进去，按下按钮，等待一会，成品就出来了。我建议你们不要把活着的生物扔进去，小猫咪提取不出任何东西。
Texts.Eng: ^green;The Extractor^white; - Next, you'll need an Extraction Lab. These machines are invaluable to any budding bio-engineer. You just toss whatever it is you want to pull materials from into it, press the buttons and BAM! Goodness comes out. I do however recommend against putting live creatures in there. Kittens extract poorly.

Texts.Chs: ^green;物质汇编机^white;首先你需要知道如何制造出一个物质汇编机。你需要用它来制作各种实验装备，你可以在你的^orange;发明家工作台^reset;里制作它。
Texts.Eng: ^green;The Matter Assembler^white; First you need to figure out how to make a Matter Assembler. You'll need this to produce most of your lab equipment. You can find this station on your ^orange;Inventor's Table^reset; right from the start of your game.

Texts.Chs: ^green;基因提取器^white; - 现在你需要一个基因提取器。这台设备会产生各种各样的基因。有了这些，你可以通过基因合成器来创造出新的植物。当然这是下一步。首先，建造属于你的基因提取器吧。
Texts.Eng: ^green;Xeno-Research Lab^white; - Now you'll need a Xeno Research Lab. This sweet baby will produce various sorts of genes. With these, you can create plants by combining the goods in a Gene Design Lab. That's next. First, build yourself the Xeno Research Lab.
